new-file-by-title.new.title: New File By File or Project Type
new-file-by-title.smart-new-file.title: Create a file in the current directory
new-file-by-title.copy-new-file.title: Create a copy of this file
new-file-by-type.configuration.title: New File By File or Project Type Extension
new-file-by-type.code-comments.author.de: code-comments @author value, os login username as default
new-file-by-type.code-comments.descripti: The fixed description information in the code comment of the specified new file defaults to Copyright (c) `year` `author`
new-file-by-type.code-comments.items.des: code-comments need display items: build-in support [author, date, version], user can customize e.g. [link, since ...]
default Indent type, 0 is [tab], otherwise is [space]
new-file-by-type.template.indents.descri: the configuration will override defaultIndent, equal 0 use [tab], otherwise use [space]
new-file-by-type.snippets.description: A user-defined code snippet for creating a file. The syntax is: https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/userdefinedsnippets
